DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare antiemetic efficacy aprepitant plus palonosetron versus aprepitant plus ramosetron high risk patient undergo laparoscopic cholecystectomy .
DOC.brief_title: Postoperative Nausea Vomiting : Ramosetron Plus Aprepitant v Palonosetron Plus Aprepitant
DOC.criteria: Non smoking , female patient , schedule laparoscopic cholecystectomy Patients gastrointestinal disorder , Patients allergies study medication , Patients receive sedative , opioid , steroid antiemetic within 24 h surgery
